title: While Loop Hangman Game
description: Create a program that uses a while loop to simulate a game of Hangman, where the user has to guess a word by suggesting letters until they guess correctly or run out of attempts.
sample_output:
You have 5 attempts remaining.
_ e _ _ _
You have 4 attempts remaining.
_ e a _ _
Do you want to guess another letter? (yes/no)
